QueryDefinition.Query: select patid, opcs, case when p_order = 1 then 44786630 else 44786631 end as type_concept_id, cast(CONCAT(cast(patid as varchar), cast(spno as varchar)) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, case when evdate is null or evdate='' then epistart else evdate end as start_date, CONCAT(cast(patid as varchar), cast(epikey as varchar)) as description FROM {sc}.procedures join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID order by patid
